 The Senior Application specialist plays a key role in ensuring the stability, quality, and strategic evolution of IT systems and processes. With significant experience and deep domain knowledge, the Senior Application specialist takes ownership of complex technical or functional areas, mentors less experienced colleagues, and drives solution design and continuous improvement initiatives. * Mentor and support junior and mid\\-level colleagues through structured guidance and coaching.
* Actively contribute to project planning, scoping, and design activities; represent IT in business\\-facing discussions.
